c74object.name: mixer
c74object.digest: Aux sends for audio channel strip.
c74object.description: mixer.aux is a four aux send control object. The object provides a single audio inlet to four separate outlets and pattr control.

attribute.name: send
attribute.digest: The send menu selection (1-4). Shows the aux channel control. Def. 1

attribute.name: aux1
attribute.digest: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0
attribute.description: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0

attribute.name: aux2
attribute.digest: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0
attribute.description: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0

attribute.name: aux3
attribute.digest: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0
attribute.description: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0

attribute.name: aux4
attribute.digest: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0
attribute.description: (0/1) turns the aux channel on/off. Def. 0

attribute.name: aux1_level
attribute.digest: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6). Def. -70
attribute.description: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6)

attribute.name: aux2_level
attribute.digest: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6). Def. -70
attribute.description: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6)

attribute.name: aux3_level
attribute.digest: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6). Def. -70
attribute.description: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6)

attribute.name: aux4_level
attribute.digest: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6). Def. -70
attribute.description: The aux send gain control, measured in dB (-70 to 6)
